ValidationRule.description: Prevent users from populating the Main Cause Text (if Other) field, when the Main Cause value of "Other - Complete Mandatory Text Field" is NOT chosen
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Reference PAC Record Type" ), ( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Main_Cause__c, 'Other - Complete Mandatory Text Field')) ), ( NOT(ISBLANK(Main_Cause_Text_if_Other__c)) ), ($Profile.Name <>"System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Do not enter a value in the Main Cause Text (if Other) field, when selecting a Main Cause value besides "Other - Complete Mandatory Text Field".
